sense.def:
A bundle
je več predmetov, zvezanih skupaj ali zavitih v blago, tako da jih lahko nesemo ali spravimo.

seg.quote: He tied the wood into a bundle.

sense.def:
To bundle someone somewhere
pomeni nekoga nekam grobo in v naglici potisniti.

seg.quote: They bundled him into the ambulance.

sense.def:
To bundle someone off somewhere
pomeni nekoga nekam v naglici poslati.

seg.quote: Jack was bundled off to Ely to stay with friends.
